settings.comment_1_content: I do enjoy this site, there are any good freebies on here you can test out. I do not like the paypal fees that are taken out of your funds when you transfer everything. Wish there were a different way to get the funds transferred without having to lose some to paypal fees. All in all, it is a pretty good site with a good abundance of items.
settings.comment_2_content: I have a very good experience with all products that I got and tested. I use them all.
settings.comment_3_content: I love using this website it helped me a lot i didnt have money they saved me money and saved my life
